title: LOL malfunction?
body: i am unable to get to loading screen after champ select and i have a fear that i may get suspended or maybe banned cause of this. it has happened many times before! RIOT please do something, please suggest to me what to do!

replies.body:
Good luck getting a red over here. I strongly suggest that if you want red support, then just send in a support ticket. The help and support boards are dead, I've really only seen my comments.

But this might be something easy to fix. Could you explain exactly what happens after champ select? And some info about your computer would be nice too, like is it Mac or Windows?
